welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming San Elizario, famous for its rich history and cultural heritage! We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Abraham Gonzalez International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Abraham Gonzalez International Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Paso International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B at El Paso International Airport serves all domestic flights for Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggs AAF Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Biggs AAF Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
